function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Antibiotic overuse leading to drug resistance and ineffective treatment of infectious diseases.","Impact":"Increased difficulty in treating infectious diseases, leading to higher mortality rates and healthcare costs.","Mitigation":"Promoting judicious use of antibiotics, developing alternative treatments, and improving public awareness about antibiotic resistance.","Technologies":"Advanced diagnostic tools for precise treatment, AI for drug discovery, and telemedicine for remote healthcare.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and patients.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, governments, and pharmaceutical companies."},{"Description":"Informal settlements and poor living conditions contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission, increased burden on healthcare systems, and more severe health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Improving access to sanitation, hygiene, and healthcare services in informal settlements, and implementing public health education programs.","Technologies":"Smart sanitation systems, telemedicine for remote healthcare, and mobile health applications for education.","People":"Residents of informal settlements, healthcare workers, and public health organizations.","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Health system vulnerability in regions with limited resources, affecting access to care and critical healthcare services.","Impact":"Limited access to critical care, increased mortality, and potential overload of healthcare facilities.","Mitigation":"Investing in healthcare infrastructure, training healthcare personnel, and implementing telemedicine for remote consultations.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, AI for predictive healthcare analytics, and mobile health clinics.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations, and international aid organizations."}]}
